name: hextorio
title: Hextorio - Build in hexagons
author: sOvr9000
description:
(Not yet thoroughly tested for mod compatibility.)
As they've always said since 325 B.C., hexagons are the bestagons! You start inside a hexagon with water and limited resources. The goal is to reach the solar system edge, like normal.

During your quest-filled journey, you'll discover many ways to take your factory to greater heights and breach the massive dungeons of each planet! And most importantly... get rich! Level up, explore, and discover a version of Factorio you wish you had all along.
